text: Buccinum ciliatum is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Buccinidae, the true whelks. ==Subspecies== * Buccinum ciliatum ciliatum Fabricius, 1780 * Buccinum ciliatum sericatum Hancock, 1846 (synonym : Buccinum sericatum Hancock, 1846) ==Description== The maximum shell size is 32 mm. ==Distribution== This species is distributed in the cold waters around the Arctic, the North West Atlantic Ocean, Greenland, Canada and the Gulf of Maine. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Buccinidae Category:Molluscs described in 1780
title: Buccinum ciliatum
